actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE nc_3vr7___smsRegex SET
		smsSender = '{{update_form.fieldState.smsSender.isVisible ? update_form.formData.smsSender : update_form.sourceData.smsSender}}',
		smsRegex = '{{update_form.fieldState.smsRegex.isVisible ? update_form.formData.smsRegex : update_form.sourceData.smsRegex}}',
    sampleSms = '{{update_form.fieldState.sampleSms.isVisible ? update_form.formData.sampleSms : update_form.sourceData.sampleSms}}',
		discardSms = '{{update_form.fieldState.discardSms.isVisible ? update_form.formData.discardSms : update_form.sourceData.discardSms}}',
		hasBalance = '{{update_form.fieldState.hasBalance.isVisible ? update_form.formData.hasBalance : update_form.sourceData.hasBalance}}',
		accountType = '{{update_form.fieldState.accountType.isVisible ? update_form.formData.accountType : update_form.sourceData.accountType}}',
		messageType = '{{update_form.fieldState.messageType.isVisible ? update_form.formData.messageType : update_form.sourceData.messageType}}',
		mc1 = '{{update_form.fieldState.mc1.isVisible ? update_form.formData.mc1 : update_form.sourceData.mc1}}',
		mc2 = '{{update_form.fieldState.mc2.isVisible ? update_form.formData.mc2 : update_form.sourceData.mc2}}',
		mc3 = '{{update_form.fieldState.mc3.isVisible ? update_form.formData.mc3 : update_form.sourceData.mc3}}',
		mc4 = '{{update_form.fieldState.mc4.isVisible ? update_form.formData.mc4 : update_form.sourceData.mc4}}'
  WHERE id = {{smsTable.selectedRow.id}};
